byline.original: By CARLTON J. CHIN and JAY P. GRANAT

abstract: Studying the championship characteristics of both teams, Texas gets the edge over St. Louis because of pitching leadership and big-game experience.
snippet: Studying the championship characteristics of both teams, Texas gets the edge over St. Louis because of pitching leadership and big-game experience.
lead_paragraph: Carlton Chin, a fund manager, and Jay Granat, psychotherapist, are authors of "Who Will Win the Big Game? A Psychological & Mathematical Method." They have previously written about the N.C.A.A. men's basketball tournament, the Stanley Cup Finals, and last year's World Series.

headline.main: Which World Series Team Has Winning Traits?
